Title: MoAds Win Phone 7 Custom Ad Control with AdMob support
Description:
MoAds is a custom Silverlight control for Win Phone 7 for showing ads from different service providers including AdMob.

MoAds has support for serving custom ads and is highly "Blendable".
HomeWiki:
Project Description

MoAds is a custom Silverlight control for Win Phone 7 for showing ads from different service providers including AdMob.

MoAds has support for serving custom ads and is highly "Blendable".

Custom Styles, Animation and Templates



<moad:AdDisplay
                Height="70"
                VerticalAlignment="Top"
                Foreground="White"
                RefreshSeconds="30">
                <moad:AdDisplay.AdAdapter>
                    <moad:AdMobAdapter
                        PublisherId="YourPublisherId"
                        CookieString="SomeCookieString"
                        AdKeywords="Money Fame Glory"
                        UseTestMode="True"/>
                </moad:AdDisplay.AdAdapter>
            </moad:AdDisplay>


This project was created by Jacob Gable
